entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
